content.question: At what values of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does the graph of <math alttext="y equals, e raised to the negative x power, plus 2 x, times e raised to the negative x power, plus x squared, times e raised to the negative x power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> have a point of inflection?

choices.label: <math alttext="x equals negative 1 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals, negative 3, minus the square root of 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals, negative 3 plus the square root of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x equals, 1 minus the square root of 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals, 1 plus the square root of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x equals, 1 minus the square root of 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals, 1 plus the square root of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
